testsuite.name: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the assignment has advanced policies

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the assignment has advanced policies

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the assignment has advanced policies

testcase.name: And I choose creating new assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the assignment has advanced policies

testcase.name: And Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the assignment has advanced policies

testcase.name: When I click on the set policies tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the assignment has advanced policies

testcase.name: And I click the Advanced Policies button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the assignment has advanced policies

testcase.name: Then I am on the Advanced Policies Editor page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the assignment has advanced policies

testcase.name: When I click the Design button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the assignment has advanced policies

testcase.name: Then I see the Remove Criterion button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the assignment has advanced policies

testcase.name: When I click the Back button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the assignment has advanced policies

testcase.name: Then I am on the Policy Editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the assignment has advanced policies

testcase.name: And I see that the show launch page checkbox is set to true
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the assignment has advanced policies

testcase.name: And I see that the show launch page checkbox is disabled
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the assignment has advanced policies

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the assignment has advanced policies

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy cannot be unchecked when the Proctored Browser is required ?[90m# assignment/AssignmentPolicies.feature:39?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click on the set policies tab?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.clickSetPoliciesTab()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see that the show launch page checkbox is set to ?[0m?[32m?[1mtrue?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.assertShowLaunchPageState(boolean)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI set the Require Proctored Browser checkbox to ?[0m?[32m?[1mtrue?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.setRequireProctoredBrowserCheckbox(boolean)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI set the proctor sign-in checkbox to ?[0m?[32m?[1mfalse?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.setProctorSignInState(boolean)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI set the show launch page checkbox to ?[0m?[32m?[1mfalse?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.setShowLaunchPageState(boolean)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see an alert message stating that the launch page must be displayed with proctored browser?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.assertProctoredBrowserAlertVisible()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI see that the show launch page checkbox is set to ?[0m?[32m?[1mtrue?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.assertShowLaunchPageState(boolean)?[0m
